api_list.name: ticker
api_list.description:
**Returns the following JSON data:**
'ticker' symbol
'date' article was posted
'time' article was posted
'title' of the article
'link' to the article
'media outlet' or source of article
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stocknews1.p.rapidapi.com/TSLA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocknews1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stocknews1.p.rapidapi.com/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocknews1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
